thread.title: Lego Batman Explains Why He Got His Own Movie: It's Because He's Awesome
thread.title_full: Lego Batman Explains Why He Got His Own Movie: It's Because He's Awesome

author: Katharine Trendacosta
title: Lego Batman Explains Why He Got His Own Movie: It's Because He's Awesome
text:
Go to permalink 
In case a movie featuring the Lego versions of Batman and company wasn’t already pushing the envelope for absurdity, we now have a “behind the scenes” video where the Lego figures explain why they made the movie. The fourth wall isn’t so much broken as it is twisted into a Möbius strip. Advertisement 
It’s not just the words that make this video funny—it’s the attention to detail. It’s Batman being credited as “Bruce Wayne’s roommate.” Or Alfred chasing bats around the Batcave in the background of Batman’s interview. Or Harley’s eating habits while the Joker talks. There are layers to this video. 
The Lego Batman Movie comes out February 10.
